summary: Project to add customer data collection features (contacts, feedback, and behavior tracking) including a search-tracking view.

existing_features.title: Add a frontend feedback collection UI that allows visitors to submit feedback (rating + optional written feedback) with clear success/error states, and wire it to the backend feedback submission API.
Add an authenticated, admin-only frontend view to review collected feedback submissions, including basic filtering/search and a manual refresh control.

Instrument the frontend to record behavior events: record a view event when a site section is navigated to via the header navigation/CTA scroll, and record click events for primary CTAs (e.g., “Book Now”) and key interactions (e.g., portfolio item open).
Add an authenticated, admin-only frontend behavior analytics view that shows recent view/click events and simple aggregates (top sections/actions) with refresh, loading, empty, and error states.

Ensure contact data collection supports admin review: verify the existing inquiry/contact submissions flow is accessible in an authenticated view, and add an explicit navigation item for admins/users to access inquiries if not already discoverable.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add website contact data collection (e.g., lead/contact form capturing name, phone/email, message)
Add customer feedback collection (post-purchase survey and/or on-site feedback form)
Add customer behavior tracking (page views, clicks, searches) including a search-tracking view/analytics integration

Add backend support to collect and store customer feedback submissions (e.g., rating and free-text feedback) from all visitors (including anonymous), and restrict feedback retrieval APIs to authenticated users with admin permission.

Add backend support for customer behavior tracking beyond search terms by recording page/section views and key click events, and restrict behavior analytics retrieval APIs to authenticated users with admin permission.

projectName: Add customer data collection: contacts, feedback, and behavior tracking
